title: Drug Makers Sued for Fueling Opioid Epidemic (Audio)
itunes:title: Drug Makers Sued for Fueling Opioid Epidemic (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Richard Ausness, a professor at the University of Kentucky School of Law, and Jodi Avergun, partner at Cadwalader and former chief of staff of the DEA, discuss how drug makers are being sued for the opioid crisis in America. They speak with Greg Stohr and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio’s “Bloomberg Law”.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
